column4: I bought the linksys wusb11 on saturday for $9 and had it working in about an hour... I was very pleased that it worked at all so I didn't have to return it :)
The version is under the velcro plate on the bottom.
usually you check google first before you buy hardware for a linux box :P
yeah, I know. It was an impulse buy. COuldn't beat the price.
